name: GoBangalore
tag_list: gobangalore, goblore, bangalore-city-guide, bangalore-news, bangalore-information, bangalore-events, bangalore-directory
overview:
GoBangaloreâ„¢ - Bangalore 2.0 A city portal providing news, stories, latest happenings, events and entertainment with a Social networking touch for Bangalore. Bangalore city portal that caters to people in all age groups. It is aimed at becoming a one stop portal for all Bangalore related information. For NGO’s and Social Reformers, GoBangalore comes as a free platform to create awareness and have their voice heard.

What can you do on GoBangalore.com? You can Search and find Local Businesses using innovative Mapzone. Ask Questions and Find Answers, Post or Search for Classified of Product and Service Providers, Find Press Releases, Network with People, Find News Articles and more. Places to Visit in and Around Bangalore, Send Free SMS, Listen to Music, Play Games and Find Traffic Updates Launching a new Product/Service, promoting an upcoming Event, or simply want to boost your visibility and on-line presence, Submit a Press Release or Post a Job on this portal to get instantly noticed and reach thousands of Bangaloreans. Explore Startups & Business with interesting products and services.
